message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'd be very interested in. It's worth a lot to me, but I'm willing to start with an offer of $9,500.  Let me know what you think.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. I am willing to pay $9,000 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for a bit more to make this worthwhile for me. I'm willing to come down to $9,250. This is a good deal for both of us - let's make this happen.
I understand your position, Alice. I'm willing to pay $9,100 for the product.
